definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: About a minute later, the sound is picked up by a microphone suspended under the receiving ship.
sentences.chinese: 约一分钟后，吊在接收船下的传声器收听到这一声音。

sentences.english: The microphone, you see, acts much like a telephone transmitter .
sentences.chinese: 你看，传声器作用与电话的送话器很相像。

sentences.english: The two-microphone method is investigated for the objective of in situ measuring the impedance of an acoustic liner in a duct.
sentences.chinese: 对现场测量管道声衬声阻抗的双传声器法进行了研究。

sentences.english: He wore a hidden microphone to secretly tape-record conversations.
sentences.chinese: 他身上藏了一个传声器，打算偷偷录下谈话内容。

sentences.english: The problem on the speaker tracking by way of estimating time delay of microphone arrays is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了利用传声器阵列估计与会者方位角的问题。

sentences.english: Finally, the silicon condenser microphone with this anti-stiction structure was fabricated successfully.
sentences.chinese: 最终我们研制成具有防粘结构的硅微电容传声器。

sentences.english: The error sensors are placed out of the control area to get measurement errors.
sentences.chinese: 将误差传声器置于控制区域之外，得到测量误差。

sentences.english: The active noise control using virtual sensors is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究虚拟传声器的有源噪声控制问题。

sentences.english: A particular frog's calls were recorded on one channel, using a transistor-condenser microphone.
sentences.chinese: 青蛙的叫声用晶体管传声器记录在一个频道上。

sentences.english: Sound transmission loss measurement using four microphones in impedance tube is studied.
sentences.chinese: 具体介绍了四传声器隔声测量原理。

sentences.english: The directional characteristic of microphone is an important factor in the measurement of directional distribution of sound field.
sentences.chinese: 传声器的指向性对声场方向性分布的测量有很大影响。

definition: to receive a radio signal/to make an audio recording/(of an auditorium etc) to have good acoustics/(vocal training, linguistics) ending (of a word or syllable)
